org.gvsig.symbology.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.symbol.line

Interface ILineSymbol

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CartographicSupport, Cloneable, IPrintable, ISymbol, Persistent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMultiLayerLineSymbol, IPictureLineSymbol, ISimpleLineSymbol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLineSymbol, MultiLayerLineSymbol, MultiShapeSymbol, PictureLineSymbol, SimpleLineSymbol, WarningSymbol

    public interface ILineSymbol
extends ISymbol, CartographicSupport
    Interface for line symbols.It has the different methods to obtain or define the attributes of a line such as color, style, width and alpha (transparency).
